official_title: A bill to authorize Federal financial assistance for the operation and maintenance of the Theodore Roosevelt Inaugural National Historic Site in Buffalo, NY.

summary.text: Authorizes Federal financial assistance for the operation and maintenance of the Theodore Roosevelt Inaugural National Historic Site in Buffalo, New York.
